typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['DW_MS_files/MS_final/part*.parquet']) ~> readMSfile
readMSfile sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	umask: 0022,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	header: (mystershopperCSVHK),
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> OutputMSHK
